mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.`name` proName FROM sm_project a WHERE a.name = #{proName} AND a.create_id = #{createId}
mapper.insert: INSERT into sm_project (id, `name`, create_id, create_time, `desc`) VALUES (#{id}, #{proName}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{proDesc})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) pageNum FROM sm_project_page b WHERE b.sm_project_id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) modelNum FROM sm_project_page b, sm_project_page_mode c WHERE b.sm_project_id = #{id} AND c.sm_project_page_id = b.id
SELECT a.id, a.`name` proName, a.`desc` proDesc FROM sm_project a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.`name` proName FROM sm_project a WHERE a.id != #{id} AND a.name = #{proName}
SELECT a.id, a.`name` FROM rm_type a ORDER BY a.sort DESC
SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.icon, COUNT(*) memberNum FROM rm_group a LEFT JOIN rm_group_member b ON b.sm_group_id = a.id WHERE a.rm_type_id = #{id} GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.sort DESC
SELECT a.id, a.prints_pic_url printsPicUrl, a.html_content htmlContent, a.html_js_content htmlJsContent FROM rm_group_member a WHERE a.sm_group_id = #{id}
